channel.title: Suggestion for multiplayer customization
channel.description:
I really like the fact that the Face Creation System is available for us players in the end despite that the devs once said we won't get it.
Another thing i would like to see in "Character customization" is an option to choose head- and facegear for the models. Like helmets, berets, sunglasses and nightvision goggles for marines and vests for Black Mesa guards.
:slight_smile:

item.title: Suggestion for multiplayer customization
item.dc:creator: Velox
item.description:
I really like the fact that the Face Creation System is available for us players in the end despite that the devs once said we won’t get it.

Another thing i would like to see in “Character customization” is an option to choose head- and facegear for the models. Like helmets, berets, sunglasses and nightvision goggles for marines and vests for Black Mesa guards.
